subtitle.translate: No FTB in this pack, sadly

description: <text>Claims and parties are provided by mod <link href="https://modrinth.com/mod/open-parties-and-claims"><underline><blue>Open Parties and Claims</blue></underline></link>. Quite cool mod, actually.</text>

<text>But you don't need commands to claim (or forceload) anything, just use <link href="https://modrinth.com/mod/xaeros-world-map"><underline><blue>Xaero's World Map</blue></underline></link> mod, which is also in this pack to do this.</text>
